overview: Bob Howard, a WWI wounded soldier in a army hospital, meets and falls in love with Princess Elena. When the Armistice is signed, he is quickly shipped back home to America. Returning to Europe, he is mistaken as a Crown Prince traveling to be married to a Princess from another country. The Princess-bride, intended for another man, is his Elena.
tagline: Dix in a rip-roaring comedy romance about a handsome husky lad who falls in love with a Princess of a small Balkan Kingdom.
title: Say It Again
